amendment.description: To provide for the promotion of financial literacy concerning retirement among members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 833 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5788) To provide for the promotion of financial literacy concerning retirement among members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 833 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Murray to Amendment SA 1003.
